author: kikar.co.il
title: Ground News - Start the day as a Jew: Thanksgiving..
text:
Summary by kikar.co.il Saying thank you is a superior value in Judaism . In leadership between man and his friend and between man and place. Thus, the first words that we find out of the mouth immediately in our wake from sleep are - “I thank you.” The thanksgiving for Hashem is then said again and again during the dawn prayer. What is the depth of the meaning of Thanksgiving for Hashem? And how does it play a part in preparing for the coming of Christ? What was the me… Share menu More
